function name: Expected an identifier after the 'function' keyword, representing the name of the function
function locals: Expected an optional integer after a function definition, representing the number of local variables in the function
call name: Expected an identifier after the 'call' keyword, representing the name of the function to call
call arguments: Expected an optional integer after a function call, representing the number of arguments to pass to the function
push argument: Expected integer constant or memory segment as the argument to a 'push' command
pop argument: Expected optional memory segment after 'pop' keyword, to store the popped value into
label argument: Expected identifier after 'label' keyword, representing the name of the label
segment opening bracket: Expected opening bracket, '[', after '{0}' memory segment to specify the index of the {0} segment
segment index: Expected integer between brackets of '{0}' memory segment to specify the index of the '{0}' segment
segment closing bracket: Expected closing bracket, ']', after index of the '{0}' memory segment
binary operator argument: Expected 0 to 2 arguments for the '{0}' command. Arguments can be integer constants or memory segments
unary operator argument: Expected an optional argument for the '{0}' command. The argument can be an integer constant or memory segment
goto argument: Expected identifier after 'goto' keyword, representing the label to go to
if argument: Expected optional condition in 'if' statement. The condition can be a memory segment, or one of 'eq', 'ne', 'lt', 'le', 'gt' or 'ge'
return argument: Expected return value after the 'return' keyword. The return value can be an integer constant or memory segment
